name: testdouble
description: A minimal test double library for TDD with JavaScript

scripts.clean: rm -rf generated dist lib coverage && yarn run clean:dist
scripts.compile:browser:test: mkdir -p generated && browserify test/browser-helper.js --outfile $npm_package_config_test_bundle -t babelify -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" -t require-globify --ignore-missing
scripts.compile: yarn run compile:node && yarn run compile:browser && yarn run compile:browser:test
scripts.cover: nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text-summary --require babel-core/register _mocha --ui mocha-given --reporter $npm_package_config_mocha_reporter --compilers coffee:coffee-script --recursive test/node-helper.coffee test/src
scripts.test:all: yarn test:unit && yarn test && yarn run test:browser && yarn run test:example && yarn run test:typescript
scripts.test:ci: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && yarn run style && yarn run test:all && yarn run clean:dist && echo "All done!"
scripts.test:example:webpack: cd examples/webpack && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:node: cd examples/node && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:lineman: cd examples/lineman && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example:babel: cd examples/babel && yarn install && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:example: yarn run test:example:node && yarn run test:example:lineman && yarn run test:example:webpack && yarn run test:example:babel
scripts.version:changelog: if command -v github_changelog_generator &>/dev/null; then github_changelog_generator; git commit -m "Changelog for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md; else echo Versioning requires you first run 'gem install github_changelog_generator' >&2; fi
scripts.version: yarn run version:write && yarn run compile && git add dist src/version.js
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn run version:changelog && git push && npm publish
